properties.entry:
INSERT INTO V_COURSE_EVALUATION_HISTORY_16 ( YR_SEM, COURSE_CODE, CRSNAME, A_CRSNAME, SECTNO, SEATSTAKEN, ACTUAL_STD, EMPNO, CRED_HRS, CRS_COL_CODE, CRS_COL_NAME, CRS_COL_NAME_ARABIC, CRS_DEPT_CODE, CRS_DEPT_NAME, CRS_DEPT_NAME_ARABIC, CRS_TYPE_CODE, CRS_TYPE_NAME ) SELECT (SELECT L_ABR_YRSEM FROM V_CURRENT_YRSEM_PORTAL) , COURSE_CODE, CRSNAME, A_CRSNAME, SECTNO, SEATSTAKEN, ACTUAL_STD, EMPNO, CRED_HRS, CRS_COL_CODE, CRS_COL_NAME, CRS_COL_NAME_ARABIC, CRS_DEPT_CODE, CRS_DEPT_NAME, CRS_DEPT_NAME_ARABIC, CRS_TYPE_CODE, CRS_TYPE_NAME
FROM V_COURSE_DETAILS
SELECT ( COUNT(SUCCESS_ANALYSIS_1) + COUNT(SUCCESS_ANALYSIS_2) + COUNT(SUCCESS_ANALYSIS_3) ) AS COUNT_SUCCESS_ANALYSIS FROM TEACHING_SURVEY_ADMIN_START WHERE L_ABR_YRSEM = :paramYrSem
SELECT START_ANALYSIS FROM TEACHING_SURVEY_ADMIN_START WHERE L_ABR_YRSEM = :paramYrSem
UPDATE TEACHING_SURVEY_ADMIN_START SET START_ANALYSIS = 'Y' WHERE L_ABR_YRSEM = :paramYrSem
